message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is significantly below its true value. I could meet you halfway at $13,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $12,500, and that's as low as I can go.
